message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can make you an offer of $120 for the product. I hope this works for you!
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate the interest. I'm willing to go down to $125 for the product. This is still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $122 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
